div.p: The Separation Mode value set includes values that can be used to indicate the category of discharge of a patient. Separation refers to the process by which an episode of care for an admitted patient ceases.

description.value: The Separation Mode value set includes values that can be used to indicate the category of discharge of a patient. Separation refers to the process by which an episode of care for an admitted patient ceases.
